Which appointment types and durations should be supported (e.g., 15/30/60 minutes)?
Should patients be able to choose specific clinicians or only by specialty?
What reminder channels (SMS, email) and timing should be configurable?
How should cancellations and rescheduling affect provider availability and waitlists?
Is insurance eligibility verification required at booking or at check-in?
What time zones and clinic hours logic must be supported (multi-location clinics)?
Should the system support telehealth/video appointments and provider integrations?
Are there data retention or privacy constraints for patient contact information?
